mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.room_id, p.user_id, COALESCE(NULLIF(u.nickname, ''), u.name) AS nickname, p.category, p.title, p.content, p.is_pinned, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.deleted_at FROM board_posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE board_posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board_posts (room_id, user_id, category, title, content, is_pinned, view_count ) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content},
#{isPinned} 0 , 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_pinned = #{isPinned} WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE board_posts SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_posts WHERE deleted_at IS NOT NULL AND deleted_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
